name: Sling (fernandoa)
description:
Sling is a grappling hook parkour game where your goal is to beat the levels as fast as possible. The game currently only has 4 levels and a playground where you can try out the mechanics. Share your highscores on our discord server!

The only difference between the paid and free version is that the paid one contains a endless mode and it will be updated more frequently, you also get to support an up and coming dev that will fuel 100% of the profits back into more games! The free version will continue to receive all the big updates but will no longer receive any new levels.

Our current roadmap aims to improve graphics for this demo. Leaderboards, an endless mode and more levels will (hopefully) come with the full release on steam (TBD).

This game is being solo developed by me, Fernando Alzueta, a 17yo who has way too much free time in my hands.
